product_name: Kelty Red Cloud Junior Pack - Juniors'
long_description: A multiday backpack designed for teens, this top-loading, long-haul Kelty Red Cloud Junior pack offers an attractive blend of comfort, features and value. Easily adjustable suspension system features curved, padded shoulder straps and a padded hipbelt to comfortably distribute the load. Adjustable shoulder straps with sternum strap and load-lifter straps combine with a padded, conical hipbelt to evenly distribute weight. Ventilated and padded back panel allows cooling airflow while helping protect the back from bulky objects. Main compartment features an interior reservoir sleeve and tube port for carrying a hydration reservoir (sold separately). 2 side pockets, 2 mesh water bottle pockets and a large front pocket keep essentials handy and organized. Zippered sleeping bag compartment features a zip-out divider to combine it with the main compartment. Daisy chain lets you lash on extras outside the pack. Padded hipbelt evens out pressure against the body, while belt stabilizers and a patented Scherer Cinch give a snug fit.
short_description: A multiday backpack designed for teens, this top-loading, long-haul Kelty Red Cloud Junior pack offers an attractive blend of comfort, features and value.
